# This contains test data for unit testing calendar events
#
# All lines starting with a `#' are ignored. Test datasets are
# separated by at least one blank line. The first line of a test
# dataset is the calendar event expression. It follows a line with the
# reference date. All subsequent lines are timestamps that are the
# expected outcome. If no such line exists, it means that there must
# be no output.

Mon *-*-* *:10,20,50:0
2020-03-06T01:47:12Z
